metadata.title: DEPRECATED: Evaluate to true if the boolean datatype is properly supported
metadata.description: This definition is intended to evalutate to true if the interpreter properly supports the boolean datatype and all of its valid operations.

modified.comment: Deprecating in favor of new OVAL Test Content

criteria.comment: True if the equals operation is supported

criterion.comment: Check of the equals operation with a single equal boolean value.
Check of the equals operation with a single unequal boolean value.
Check of the equals operation with a single equal boolean value (mixed types).
Check of the equals operation with a single unequal boolean value (mixed types).

criteria.comment: True if the not equal operation is supported

criterion.comment: Check of the not equal operation with a single equal boolean value.
Check of the not equal operation with a single unequal boolean value.
Check of the not equal operation with a single equal boolean value (mixed types).
Check of the not equal operation with a single unequal boolean value (mixed types).
